articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Tong Chun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Tong Chun 
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un Friday sent a wreath to the bier of Kim Tong Chun, KPA general officer and lecturer of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Congratulations to Mali Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Mali Foreign Minister
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Abdoulaye Diop upon his stay in office as minister of Foreign Affairs, African Integration and International Cooperation of the Republic of Mali.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the Malian minister bigger successes in his responsible work.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Accuses Israeli PM of Hurting DPRK's Dignity and Social System
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Accuses Israeli PM of Hurting DPRK's Dignity and Social System
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA Friday assailing the Israeli prime minister for his provocative remarks hurting the DPRK's dignity and social system:
					 According to a report, on Jan. 19 the Israeli prime minister at a joint press conference with the Japanese prime minister who visited Israel accused the DPRK of enforcing merciless and radical dictatorship. He talked rubbish that the DPRK is taking a violent and threatening stand toward its neighboring countries, it is mulling tipping ballistic missiles with nukes under a military nuclear program for aggression and the international community should not repeat the error made at the negotiations with north Korea.
					
					 This is an unpardonable insult and provocation to the dignity and social system in the DPRK and the choice made by its people.
					
					 In order to conceal its true colors as a harasser of Mideast peace the successive rulers of Israel have been apt to talk about the "missile deal and nuclear cooperation" between the DPRK and Mideast countries.  Not content with this, Israel recently went the lengths of hurting the DPRK's dignified social system.
					
					 The people-centred Korean-style socialist system is the most advantageous system under which the people became masters of everything and it serves them and the DPRK's nuclear weapons are powerful deterrence to protect its social system.
					
					 What the Israeli prime minister uttered is a revelation of his ignorance of the social system in the DPRK and nothing but his base behavior to please the forces hostile to the DPRK.
					
					 Israel not only represents dictatorial forces for aggression that trample down the legitimate right of the Palestinian people and indiscriminately kill them but also is a rogue group that poses a nuclear threat and makes terrorist attack on its neighboring countries with lots of nuclear weapons under the U.S. patronage in disregard of international law.
					
					 Everybody knows about the shamelessness of Israel telling lies and making fabrications and pointing accusing fingers to others to justify its criminal acts and evade the censure and condemnation by the international community.
					
					 The DPRK warns Israel against refusing to abandon its inveterate bad habit of taking issue with the former quite often in its interests.
					
					 Israel had better roll back, to begin with,  its inhuman and bellicose policy as an arch criminal killing innocent Palestinians and disturber of peace in Mideast before pulling up others.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Should Not Pay Lip Service to Issue of "Divided Families"
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Should Not Pay Lip Service to Issue of "Divided Families"
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean authorities asserted that it is the "national obligation" and the "top priority task" to settle the issue of "divided families," adding that it is necessary to realize the reunion of "divided families" if the north-south dialogue is resumed.
					 The south Korean chief executive, in particular, urged the north to come out for dialogue with "open heart" in order to fundamentally solve the issue of "divided families." She claimed that the north was to blame for the failure to arrange the reunion of "divided families."
					
					  A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a statement on Friday terms this acts of misinterpreting the essence of the grave situation where the issue of the inter-Korean relations including the reunion of divided families and relatives from the north and the south remain unsettled, and acts of misleading the public. This is an unbearable mockery and insult to the desire of all Koreans for the improved inter-Korean relations and the nation's unity and reunification.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 It was due to such hurdles as the "May 24 steps" taken by the south Korean authorities that reunification events which had been brisk between the north and the south since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and cooperation undertakings between the north and the south, including joint unearthing of historical relics, academic symposiums, social and cultural exchange and tour of Mt. Kumgang, were suspended overnight and the most urgent humanitarian cooperation undertakings including the reunion of divided families and relatives failed to make progress. All these facts are well known to the world.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities are talking a lot about the reunion of "divided families" and "exchange at non-governmental level" after blocking the north-south exchange and cooperation by themselves. This is self-contradictory sophism and height of shamelessness.
					
					 No matter how noisily the south Korean authorities may talk about the reunion of "divided families" and "exchange" after building institutional barriers barring the reunion of divided families and relatives, no one will pay heed to those useless wordplays and hypocritical remarks. 
					
					 Even if the reunion of divided families and relatives takes place with "the May 24 steps" remaining in force, it will only serve the purpose of propaganda and will not help fundamentally settle the issue.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities are truly concerned for the humanitarian issue, they should not only pay lip-service to the issue of "divided families" but lift before anything else the steps deliberately taken for confrontation.
					
					 If they have true will to settle the issue of the north-south relations including the reunion of divided families and relatives, they should not play poor tricks to misrepresent the essence of the present situation and mislead the public but show their will in practice from a proper stand on the DPRK's just proposal.
					
					 The DPRK will follow what change the south Korean authorities will make in their stance together with all the compatriots.

articles.title: Norwegian King Hopes for Boosting Friendly and Cooperative Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Norwegian King Hopes for Boosting Friendly and Cooperative Relations with DPRK 
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Kang Yong Dok, DPRK ambassador to Norway, presented his credentials to Harald V, king of the Kingdom of Norway, on January 15. 
					 The king wished the Korean people happiness and prosperity, hoping that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms.

articles.title: Skating Tournament of Schoolchildren Held
articles.content:
Skating Tournament of Schoolchildren Held
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- A skating tournament of the 41st National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize was held at Lake Michon of Mt. Taesong from Jan. 20 to 23.
					 The tournament, divided into senior secondary schools, junior secondary schools and primary schools, brought together more than 600 schoolchildren.
					
					 Men skaters of Rajin Senior Secondary School in Rajin District, Rason City took the first place at the total points and women skaters of Chonggye Senior Secondary School in the same district proved successful, men and women skaters of Yonam Junior Secondary School in Paekam County and men skaters of Tonghung Primary School in Central District, Pyongyang and women skaters of Hungdok Primary School in Hungdok District of Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province placed the first at the total points.

articles.title: Production of School Things on Increase in DPRK's North Phyongan Province
articles.content:
Production of School Things on Increase in DPRK's North Phyongan Province 
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- North Phyongan Province in the DPRK has been paying big efforts to educational and sports development as part of work to turn the country into a highly civilized socialist nation.
					 The Ponbu Kindergarten, Paeksa Primary School and Sinuiju Secondary School No. 1 are noted throughout the country for their genius education while Tongrim County in the province is well known for having trained a number of weightlifting aces.
					
					 The province pays primary efforts to supplying high-grade school things to students.
					
					 The Kusong Ironware and Essential Plastic Goods Factory has been operating its machines at full capacity for production of school things.
					
					 The Sinuiju Essential Plastic Goods Factory has finished technical innovation of equipment to improve the quality of school things, while paper mills in the province have put spurs to production of notebooks.
					
					 Meanwhile, the North Phyongan Provincial Sports Apparatus Factory has put production on a normal basis by applying advanced technologies to various production processes.

articles.title: DPRK Proud of Kim Hyong Jik University of Education
articles.content:
DPRK Proud of Kim Hyong Jik University of Education
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Hyong Jik University of Education has developed into a center for training teachers and educational science studies in the DPRK.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il saw to it that Pyongyang University of Education No. 1 was renamed Kim Hyong Jik University of Education in January, Juche 64 (1975).
					
					 Over the past four decades the university has made lots of achievements as a teacher training center and a pedigree base for education of the younger generation under the loving care of the peerless great men.
					
					 The university has explored hundreds of subjects including "education engineering", "psychological control", "computer-network program", "bio-engineering" and "Nano-chemistry" and has written textbooks and reference books of thousands of kinds.
					
					 Researches have been intensified in educational and scientific research rooms and educational information study rooms equipped with ultramodern educational means appeared in departments to be used for teaching, researches and study.
					
					 The university put education on a scientific and IT basis and provided conditions for tele-education at universities and colleges across the country.
					
					 In this course a number of teachers became winners of new teaching method certificates and ranked themselves among October 8 model professors.
					
					 The university has satisfactorily solved scientific and technological problems.
					
					 It has produced lots of winners of Kim Il Sung Prize, labor heroes candidate academicians, professors and doctors and proved successful at various games including the national students' sports games for September 5 Prize.

articles.title: U.S. Should Work for Detente on Korean Peninsula: News Analyst
articles.content:
U.S. Should Work for Detente on Korean Peninsula: News Analyst
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The United States is intentionally aggravating the situation on the Korean Peninsula from the outset of the year.
					 The U.S. Department of State disclosed its intention to continue the joint military exercises with south Korea, refuting as "inappropriate links" and "implicit threat" the DPRK's proposal that it is ready to suspend its nuclear test if the exercises are stopped.
					
					 As the world public commented, the DPRK's proposal is an expression of goodwill for peaceful solution to the crisis on the Korean Peninsula that has lasted for decades.
					
					 But the U.S. turned down this proposal though it is well aware that such military exercises for aggression may spoil the atmosphere for dialogue between the north and the south of Korea and push the situation on the Korean Peninsula into an extreme phase.
					
					 In this regard, a south Korean scholar said: The U.S. does not want the improved inter-Korean relations, from its strategic view. It is because the improvement of inter-Korean relations will lead to the detente in Northeast Asia and the U.S. will find no reason to demand more expense for its military presence from south Korea. In particular, possible peaceful cooperation atmosphere in Northeast Asia will give no pretext for the U.S. to contain China.
					
					 Media of various countries said that national security is a prerequisite for any country, to say nothing of the DPRK whose sovereignty and right to existence have been extremely infringed for decades due to the unprecedented sanctions and isolation moves by the U.S. The reason why the DPRK takes serious attitude toward the U.S.-south Korea military exercises is that such annual exercises have posed a grave threat to its security, compelling it to have access to nukes, they pointed out.
					
					 The world public contends that the U.S. should work in a responsible manner for detente and stability on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: There Is No Mercy to Provokers: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
There Is No Mercy to Provokers: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The case of the U.S. imperialists' armed spy ship Pueblo captured by the DPRK on January 23, 1968 proved before the world that any provocation against the DPRK would be sternly punished.
					 Referring to the details of the Pueblo case, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article:
					
					 History has advanced far but the U.S. ambition for invading the DPRK remains unchanged.
					
					 The U.S. is making another mistake, far from drawing a due lesson from its failed policy towards the DPRK.
					
					  It is a daydream to try to persuade the imperialists and make them understand with theories and words at present when they are working hard to dominate the world by force.
					
					 The U.S. is overplaying its military muscle. It is seriously mistaken if it regards the DPRK as other countries which collapsed overnight, overpowered by the U.S. military muscle.
					
					 The U.S. has not yet understood its rival properly.
					
					 It should not forget its defeats in the confrontation with the DPRK in the 1950s and afterwards.
					
					 It had better remember the voices made by the world progressives at the time when the Pueblo case occurred.
					
					 The DPRK has warned more than once the U.S., the sworn enemy.
					
					 But the U.S. persists in its moves to provoke the DPRK.
					
					 There is no mercy to provokers.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bringing about New Turn in Building Economic Giant and Civilized Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bringing about New Turn in Building Economic Giant and Civilized Nation
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial calls for bringing about a new turn in building an economic giant and a civilized nation to celebrate the 70th anniversaries of national liberation and founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) as the revolutionary, great auspicious events.
					 It is a militant goal of the WPK to glorify the DPRK, an invincible political and military power, as the best country overtaking the world in economy and culture, the editorial says, adding:
					
					 The economic and cultural fronts are the main ones in the building of a thriving nation and outposts for defending socialism.
					
					 Only when the DPRK overtakes imperialism on these two fronts where fierce confrontation and competition with enemies are under way, is it possible to more powerfully demonstrate the absolute truth and advantages of socialism. 
					
					 The construction of an economic giant and a civilized nation is aimed to provide the people with the best and highly civilized life.
					
					 It is the grand plan of the WPK to let all people grow up to be revolutionary talents possessed of a wealth of scientific and technological knowledge, noble moral traits and strong physical bodies, while enjoying all blessings under socialism in the prospering homeland.
					
					  It is necessary to dynamically step up the building of an economic giant and civilized nation in order to significantly improve the people's living standards in this significant year and make a new history of golden mountains and fields and big fish haul and usher in a new era of cultural efflorescence in the 21st century.
					
					 Only when an uninterrupted great leap forward and innovations are brought about in the building of a socialist economic power and civilized nation, will the venue of the grand October festival be prevalent with people's jubilation and cheerful laughter and will the WPK's flag representative of the destiny of the people shed more resplendent rays.

articles.title: Creation of Atmosphere for Improving Inter-Korean Relations Brooks Not Moment's Delay: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Creation of Atmosphere for Improving Inter-Korean Relations Brooks Not Moment's Delay: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The creation of an atmosphere for mending the inter-Korean relations is the work to be preceded without fail for improving the deteriorated north-south relations and laying a solid foundation for independent reunification. It also brooks not a moment's delay.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in an article.
					
					 A landmark turn in mending the inter-Korean relations depends on how the north and the south take the first step for creating the climate for repairing the relations, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Ending the confrontation of social systems and war exercises is a prerequisite to creating the atmosphere for mending the inter-Korean relations and peaceful climate.
					
					 It is quite useless for the north and the south to sit at a negotiating table while absolutizing their own ideologies and systems and seeking confrontation of social systems and war drills to do harm to the other side. This would only escalate distrust and conflict, far from solving complicated problems.
					
					 The atmosphere for repairing the inter-Korean relations can be created only when the north and the south make joint efforts.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have a true stand to improve the relations with the north, there will be neither reason nor excuse to fail to respond to the positive call of the DPRK.
					
					 What matters is whether they have willingness to mend the inter-Korean relations or not. Whether they stop the racket for confrontation of social systems and north-targeted joint military exercises or not is a touchstone distinguishing their will to mend the relations with the north.
					
					 "Dialogue" and "sincerity" touted by them, sidestepping this issue, are no more than empty rhetoric.
					
					 The prospect of the inter-Korean relations entirely depends on how the south Korean authorities respond to the patriotic call of the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Demands Nullification of All False "Human Rights" Documents against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Demands Nullification of All False "Human Rights" Documents against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and other forces hostile toward the DPRK have worked desperately to do harm to the DPRK by internationalizing and dramatizing its "human rights" issue only to suffer a bitter setback.
					 "Defector from the north" Sin Tong Hyok whom the U.S. called "a figure symbolic of fierce fight against human rights abuses" and put forward as a stooge in its "human rights" racket admitted his crimes. Sin let loose a whole gamut of slanders and lies while working as a key "testifier" at a time when the "report of the Commission of Inquiry (CI)" on the human rights situation in the DPRK was worked out. The report was used as a key document for "human rights resolution" against the DPRK that was railroaded through a session of the UN General Assembly later last year.
					
					 Sin admitted that he told lies and said he would withdraw from the "anti-DPRK human rights campaign."
					
					 That meant the total bankruptcy of the U.S. vicious anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign.
					
					 The DPRK already made it clear that the "report of the CI" and UN "human rights resolution" were false documents based on testimonies made by those who fled the DPRK after committing crimes.
					
					 The undeniable validity of the DPRK's assertion was proved by the confession of Sin, who played a key role in offering false data.
					
					 As already known, Sin deserted his parents and motherland, raped a minor and he is the worst crook who used false name and forged his personal history.
					
					 He, talking about a "concentration camp of political offenders" which does not exist in the DPRK, tried to give impression that he survived there, a height of hypocrisy and a challenge to justice and truth.
					
					 No wonder, an American journalist who authored a book about the non-existent "concentration camp of political offenders" in the DPRK based on the plausible testimonies made by Sin lamented his act in an article contributed to The Washington Post in the wake of Sin's confession.
					
					 What matters is that the U.S. shielded such an imbecile.
					
					 U.S. State Secretary Kerry and other authorities of the U.S. personally took Sin to international arena as part of their frantic smear campaign against the DPRK. This fully revealed the inside story of the "human rights" campaign under the eyes of the world.
					
					 The authorities of the U.S. had no way but to extol the human reject on the international arena only to reveal their pitiful plight.
					
					 The UN, too, should be called into question as it played into the hands of the U.S., while dancing to the tune of its smear anti-DPRK "human rights" farce.
					
					 Under the pressure and manipulation of the U.S. and its followers, the UN adopted the unprecedentedly infamous "human rights resolution". This has been recorded as the biggest crime that most cruelly violated the sovereignty of a country in the 70-year long history of the UN.
					
					 In the light of Sin's confession, all the documents that took issue with the DPRK over its "human rights" performance should be nullified.
					
					 It would be a serious miscalculation to think of admonishing and pressing the DPRK on the basis of false documents any further.
					
					 It is self-evident that hypocrisy and deception will not work in this bright world.
					
					 This century differs from the past one when fascist Germany flouted the public opinion, claiming what it said a hundred times became truth.
					
					 Truth is bound to be revealed and those who resort to smear campaign are to be buried in the graveyard of history in face of strong denunciation and censure by the international community.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Authorities Accused of Spearheading and Conniving at Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Authorities Accused of Spearheading and Conniving at Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Human scum in south Korea appeared in Paju City, Kyonggi Province together with tricksters of the "human rights foundation" of the U.S. at midnight on Jan. 19 and scattered leaflets hurting the social system in the DPRK.
					 They held a press conference next day at which they asserted that those leaflets were "for the purpose of warning" and leaflet-scattering by use of drones would be "considered."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is nothing surprising that human scum are making desperate efforts to stem the trend of the situation towards dialogue and detente at any cost, afraid of the process for repairing the north-south relations.
					
					 Those betes noires went frantic with the leaflet scattering operation, even making public its date. This fact goes to prove that they could behave so backed by those forces behind them.
					
					 It is open secret that the U.S. is driving human scum into leaflet scattering operations, providing them with a huge amount of fund.
					
					 Facts go to clearly prove that the U.S. spearheading anti-DPRK leaflet scattering is the arch criminal disturbing the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and blocking Korea's reunification and a chieftain of plots and intrigues.
					
					 The anti-DPRK leaflet scattering is a blatant challenge to the DPRK's efforts for mending the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 If the leaflet scattering is allowed to go on in south Korea, the inter-Korean relations will be bound to totally collapse and the south Korean authorities will be wholly to blame for it.
					
					 A commentary of Minju Joson warns that the south Korean authorities will suffer a bitter setback if they go on with anti-DPRK leaflet operations, persistently patronizing those human scum.

articles.title: Acts to Stamp out Reunification Movement Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Acts to Stamp out Reunification Movement Unabated in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- There are undesirable moves aimed to stamp out the reunification movement in south Korea at a time when the nation's enthusiasm for independent reunification is running high.
					 The Ministry of Justice recently set forth a plan to push forward a proposal for applying sanctions against "anti-state organizations" and "enemy-benefiting organizations", said the Yonhap News of south Korea. 
					
					 The proposed "revision of the Security Law" is to let the court issue an order of disbanding "anti-state organizations" or "enemy-benefiting organizations" and ban assembly, demonstration and all other activities conducted in the name of those organizations.
					
					 The south Korean conservative forces are persistently resorting to suppression of the reunification movement, going against the trend of the nation for creating a climate for improving inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Demands Japan Make Apology for Past Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Demands Japan Make Apology for Past Crimes
						
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea carried an editorial demanding the Japanese government bend its knees before the Koreans and make an apology for the past crimes. 
					The editorial accused Japan's chief executive of persistently denying its past history while insisting that "aggression was not defined."
					
					It denounced Japan for continuing visits to Yasukuni Shrine honoring war criminals and denying Kono's statement in which he admitted a little the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in the past.

articles.title: S. Korean Scholar Refutes Story about Torpedo Attack on Warship Cheonan
articles.content:
S. Korean Scholar Refutes Story about Torpedo Attack on Warship Cheonan
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Hwang Su, honorary professor at Kyongsong University of south Korea, again refuted  the investigation results of the south Korean authorities which claimed  that warship Cheonan was sunk by a torpedo attack.
					 Accounts of the interview with him were posted on the south Korean internet paper Voice of People on January 20.
					
					 At the interview he declared as a scientist he was sure that there was no underwater explosion at the time Cheonan was sunk.
					
					 He said that in a word the report on investigation results released by the joint investigation team was a false one.

articles.title: Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Ducks suspected to be bird flu were found at farmhouses in North Jolla Province and Muan, South Jolla Province of south Korea on Jan. 19, according to south Korean CBS.
					 Bird flu virus was found in the dead wild geese on a farm of Pusan on the same day.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Refers to Spirit as Strong as Blizzards on Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Refers to Spirit as Strong as Blizzards on Mt. Paektu
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Hyon Hwan, director of the Institute of Independent Idea in the U.S., released an article titled "Spirit as strong as blizzards on Mt. Paektu" on Jan. 9.
					 Climbing Janggun Peak, the top of Mt. Paektu, last year, Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission, said we should take the road of revolution to the end in the spirit as strong as the blizzards on Mt. Paektu which indicates the way of winning the final victory, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that the revolution precisely means faith and if one abandons faith, he cannot make a revolution, adding that only those who cherish firm revolutionary faith can take the road of revolution to the end and proudly appear before the country and its people.
					
					 Faith is what keeps a revolutionary alive and one should never change one's revolutionary faith.
					
					 That was why Kim Jong Un climbed Mt. Paektu and called upon all people to steadfastly follow the road of independence, Songun and socialism to the end in the spirit as strong as the blizzards on Mt. Paektu.
					
					 When one fights in this spirit, there is nothing to fear and nothing impossible.
					
					 This spirit is the spirit of the DPRK in the struggle and the spirit of victory.
					
					 The people in the north will dash ahead at the Korean speed in 2015 in this spirit, certainly reunify the country and build a thriving nation.

articles.title: Koreans in China Supports Appeal of Joint Meeting of DPRK Government, Political Parties and Organizations
articles.content:
Koreans in China Supports Appeal of Joint Meeting of DPRK Government, Political Parties and Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China released a statement on Thursday in support of the appeal to all Koreans adopted at a joint meeting of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.
					 The appeal is a very just and timely step as it reflects the desire of fellow countrymen for reunification and the demand of the times, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Koreans in China will wage a more dynamic struggle to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification.
					
					 They strongly condemn the unreasonable interference and aggression moves of the U.S.-led outsiders alienating the Korean nation, fanning up confrontation and blocking the way of Korea's reunification.
					
					 They strongly demand once again the south Korean "government" unconditionally stop joint military exercises with foreign forces which bar the north-south relations from being mended and bring nuclear disaster to the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Brazilian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Brazilian Figure
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Acilino Riveiro, national coordinator of the Genuine Democratic Movement of Brazil, issued a statement on January 16 in support of the proposal for Korea's reunification set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address.
					 He quoted Kim Jong Un, Marshal of the DPRK, saying in his New Year address for 2015 that however complicated the situation may be and whatever obstacles and difficulties may stand in our way, we should unfailingly achieve national reunification, a lifetime wish of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the greatest desire of the nation, and build a dignified and prosperous reunified country on this land.
					
					 The large-scale war games ceaselessly held every year in south Korea are the root cause of the escalating tension on the Korean peninsula and the danger of nuclear war facing the Korean nation, he noted.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 If the south Korean authorities are sincere in their will for the Korean reunification, they should discontinue all war moves against the fellow countrymen including the military exercises they conduct with foreign forces, make efforts for creating a peaceful environment favorable to the reunification and not seek "unification of systems" that incites distrust and conflict between the north and the south.
					
					 The U.S. should desist from pursuing the anachronistic policy hostile towards the DPRK and reckless acts of aggression and boldly make a policy switch.
					
					 We are convinced that all Koreans will turn out as one in the struggle for national reunification and glorify 2015 as a year for bringing about a great turn to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification in response to the patriotic call of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Germany, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Germany, Nigeria 
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany and book exhibitions took place at a hospital and the Ministry of Rural Development of Zamfara State, Nigeria from January 14 to 17 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 On display at the venues of the events were works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and other books introducing Songun Korea. 
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said that Kim Jong Il laid a strong foundation for prosperity of the DPRK through his energetic field guidance in the whole period of his great life. 
					
					 He put forward children as king of the country, showed all loving care for them and provided all conditions so that they may bring their talents into full bloom, the chairman noted. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the DPRK to victory by carrying forward the noble cause of Kim Jong Il, he pointed out, adding:
					
					 I really envy the Korean people enjoying happiness down through generations under the care of the great men. 
					
					 The director of the hospital in Zamfara State of Nigeria said miracles and innovations are being made in the DPRK every day though the U.S. has imposed sanctions upon the DPRK and launched "human rights" racket against it. 
					
					 Such successes can be achieved only in the DPRK holding the great leader in high esteem, the director noted. 
					
					 An advisor to the Ministry of Rural Development of Zamfara State, Nigeria praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the great men recognized by the world as they laid a foundation for the independent national economy and consolidated it.

articles.title: Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated in Nepal
articles.content:
Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated in Nepal
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The Nepalese national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) and the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Katmandu on January 18.
					 C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) who doubles as chairman of the Nepalese national committee for remembering Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee set the celebration period from Jan. 19 to Apr. 16 and decided to give wide publicity to exploits Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed for socialism and global independence, and the DPRK vigorously advancing along the road of Songun and socialism under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, and organize colorful political and cultural events including meeting, seminar and book exhibition.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Switzerland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Switzerland
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed with due ceremony in Basel on January 17.
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to post on its website Kim Jong Il's works and articles praising his exploits and organize colorful political and cultural events including meeting, seminar and film show between January 24 and February 18.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX rechaza la acusacion del premier Israeli
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX rechaza la acusacion del premier israeli
						
Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ACNC) -- En relacion con que el premier israeli pronuncio disparates provocativos contra la dignidad y el regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 23 a la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea la siguiente respuesta:
					  Segun trascendidos, en la entrevista de prensa conjunta concedida el dia 19 con su homologo japones que visito a su pais, el premier israeli califico a la RPDC de la dictadura implacable y radical.
					
					Chismeo que nuestro pais toma la actitud violenta y amenazante contra los paises vecinos e intenta desarrollar las armas nucleares con el programa nuclear militar de caracter agresivo e instalarlas en misiles balisticos.
					
					  Prosiguio que la comunidad internacional no debe repetir los errores cometidos en las negociaciones con el Norte de Corea.
					
					  Esta chismografia constituye un insulto intolerable y provocacion contra nuestra dignidad y regimen y la opcion de nuestro pueblo.
					
					  Para disimular su naturaleza de perturbadores de la paz del Medio Oriente, los sucesivos gobernantes israelies solieron circular el "rumor de trafico de misiles" y el "de cooperacion nuclear" entre la RPDC y los paises de esa region.
					
					  Esta vez, se atrevieron a censurar hasta el digno regimen de nuestro pais.
					
					  El regimen socialista al estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares es el mas ventajoso donde el pueblo es el dueno de lo todo y todo sirve para el pueblo, y nuestras armas nucleares son el fuerte disuasivo para defender ese regimen.
					
					  El premier israeli censuro esta vez la dignidad y regimen de la RPDC. Esto es una expresion de su ignorancia sobre el regimen de nuestro pais o una muestra de adulacion sucia a las fuerzas hostiles anti-RPDC.
					
					  Israel es la fuerza dictatorial y agresiva que viola los derechos legitimos del pueblo palestino y lo asesina indiscriminadamente y el  colectivo de bribones que ejerce a sus caprichos la amenaza nuclear y ataque terrorista contra los paises vecinos teniendo numerosas armas nucleares bajo la proteccion de EE.UU. sin hacer caso del derecho internacional.
					
					  Todo el mundo conoce el descaro de Israel que justifica sus actos criminales y critica a otros tergiversando los hechos para eludir la censura y condena de la sociedad internacional.
					
					  Advertimos a Israel que no deja su vicio cronico de acusarnos en cualquier hora segun sus intereses.
					
					  Antes de cuestionar a otros, Israel debe corregir primero su politica antietica y belicista como autor del asesinato de palestinos inocentes y como perturbador de la paz del Medio Oriente.

articles.title: CRPP exige al Sur de Corea que no hable en vano del problema de "familiares separados"
articles.content:
CRPP exige al Sur de Corea que no hable en vano del problema de "familiares separados"
						
Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, las autoridades surcoreanas dicen que si se inicia el dialogo Norte-Sur, hay que realizar primero el encuentro de los "familiares separados" en ambas partes coreanas, insistiendo en que la solucion de este problema es el "deber nacional" y la "tarea de mayor prioridad".
					En particular, la mandataria surcoreana dijo que para resolver fundamentalmente ese problema, el Norte debe participar en el dialogo con el "alma abierta".
					
					Asi hablo como si el Norte de Corea tuviera la culpa de la no apertura del encuentro de "familiares separados".
					
					El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria publico el dia 23 una declaracion calificandolo de acto verbal para enganar a la opinion publica y tergiversar la esencia de la situacion severa en que no se resuelve el problema de relaciones Norte-Sur, como el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados.
					
					Igualmente, constituye una burla e insulto intolerable a la aspiracion y deseo de todos los coreanos sobre la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y la unidad y reunificacion de la nacion, subraya la nota y continua:
					
					Como ya conocido por todo el mundo, debido a los obstaculos como las "medidas del 24 de mayo" inventadas por las autoridades surcoreanas, fueron interrumpidos los actos de reunificacion y la cooperacion  entre el Norte y el Sur como el descubrimiento conjunto de reliquias historicas, el seminario academico, el intercambio socio-cultural y el turismo al monte Kumgang que se realizaban activamente despues de publicada la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					Quedaron estancadas tambien las mas urgentes labores de cooperacion humanitaria, incluyendo el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados.
					
					 Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas, que bloquearon el intercambio y cooperacion entre el Norte y el Sur inventando las barreras, abogan ahora por el encuentro de "familiares separados" y el "intercambio a nivel civil", lo cual es una sofisteria y el climax de cinismo. 
					
					Puesto que ellas abogan por el encuentro de ese tipo despues de fabricar las barreras institucionales para impedirlo, nadie prestara oidos a sus palabras vacias e hipocritas.
					
					Si se dejan intactas las "medidas del 24 de mayo", el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados sera una simple materia de propaganda, aunque se abra, y no podra resolver radicalmente el problema de ellos.
					
					Si estan interesadas de veras en el humanitarismo, las autoridades surcoreanas no deben hablar por gusto del mismo problema sino eliminar las medidas de barrera que inventaron intencionalmente para la confrontacion.
					
					Si tienen de veras la voluntad de solucionar el problema de relaciones intercoreanas inclusive la cita referida, deben mostrar con acciones su posicion en cuanto a la justa propuesta de la RPDC, en vez de recurrir a las artimanas de tergiversar la esencia de la situacion actual y enganar la opinion publica.
					
					Observaremos atentamente junto con todos los compatriotas el cambio de posicion de las autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: Portavoz de CRN condena la caza de fuerzas "pro-Norte" en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz de CRN condena la caza de fuerzas "pro-Norte" en el Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional hizo publica el dia 22 una declaracion en relacion con que en el Sur de Corea se libra desde los primeros dias del ano nuevo la campana contra las "fuerzas pro-Norte (de Corea)" con vistas a exterminar las fuerzas progresistas pro-reunificacion.
					Las autoridades surcoreanas tildaron a la compatriota residente en Estados Unidos, Sin Un Mi, y a la representante del Forum de Estudio de Politicas Deseadas del Sur de Corea, Hwang Son, de "seguidoras al Norte" cuestionando sus actividades del pasado. 
					
					Ellas realizaron en el ano pasado una gira por varias regiones surcoreanas, inclusive Seul, impartiendo conferencias sobre la impresion de su visita a la RPDC. 
					
					Luego de la represion feroz contra ellas, las autoridades surcoreanas deportaron el dia 10 por la fuerza a Sin y encarcelaron el dia 14 a Hwang.
					
					Ademas, abrieron una investigacion sobre una parlamentaria por la Alianza Democratica para Nuevas Politicas pretextando que ella participo en las conferencias arriba referidas. Insatisfechas de haber arrestado a Hwang, sometieron al interrogatorio hasta a su esposo Yun Ki Jin, copresidente de la Solidaridad por la Democracia, la Vida, la Reunificacion Pacifica y la Soberania.
					
					Los dias 13 y 18, condenaron a duras penas a un ex profesor de unos 50 anos de edad y a un morador de unos 30 anos de edad por haber publicado en Internet los articulos de elogio al Norte de Corea y tener los "materiales pro-enemigos".
					
					Por otra parte, al presentar a la presidenta el informe de trabajo del Ano Nuevo, el Ministerio de Justicia dijo que preparara el "fundamento legal" con que se pueda prohibir las actividades de las "entidades pro-enemigas" como la direccion surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria y las otras partidarias del Norte y hasta disolverlas.
					
					En su nota, el portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional condeno categoricamente que esa campana de represion resulta acto  antinacional y anti-reunificacion que desafia frontalmente a la aspiracion y anhelo de todos los coreanos que desean la reconciliacion, unidad y reunificacion.
					
					En su esencia, la "teoria de fuerzas pro-Norte", de que hablan tanto las autoridades surcoreanas, significa la de confrontacion fratricida y de regimenes, subraya el documento y prosigue:
					
					Hablar del "dialogo" y "confianza" negando el regimen de la contraparte es una actitud enganosa.
					
					La sofisteria sobre el "dialogo" y "unificacion" de las autoridades surcoreanas no pasa de ser un embuste para enganar la opinion publica interna y externa y calmar la indignada opinion publica. La cada dia mas abierta campana contra las "fuerzas pro-Norte" constituye una declaracion oficial de que no cesaran la represion contra las fuerzas progresistas y pro-reunificacion aunque se abra el dialogo entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Hoy dia, lo que debe ser eliminado urgentemente por la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion, no son las supuestas fuerzas "pro-Norte" sino la "tendencia proyanqui" de las autoridades surcoreanas que obedecen a la demanda gangsteril de toda indole de EE.UU.
					
					No se puede esperar ningun dialogo sincero entre ambas partes coreanas ni la mejora de relaciones N-S sin frenar la intervencion de EE.UU. en los asuntos internos de nuestra nacion y mientras las autoridades surcoreanas mantengan su posicion seguidora a EE.UU. y su naturaleza conflictiva.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben cesar de inmediato las acciones antinacionales y anti-reunificacion, que niegan y hostilizan a la contraparte de dialogo y desafian a la aspiracion y anhelo de los compatriotas, y tomar una posicion sincera para el mejoramiento de relaciones Norte-Sur.

articles.title: Efectuado torneo de patinaje por premio Jongilbong
articles.content:
Efectuado torneo de patinaje por premio Jongilbong
						
Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar desde el dia 20 hasta el 23 en el lago Michon del monte Taesong el torneo de patinaje sobre hielo de la 41a Competencia Deportiva Nacional de Jovenes y Ninos Escolares por el Premio Jongilbong.
					En la cita deportiva dividida en los sectores de Escuela Secundaria Superior, Escuela Secundaria Basica y Escuela Primaria,  participaron mas de 600 jovenes y ninos escolares.
					
					En la rama de Escuela Secundaria Superior, los jugadores de la Escuela Secundaria Superior de Rajin de la zona de Rajin de la ciudad de mismo nombre ocuparon el primer lugar general y las jugadoras de la Escuela Superior de Chonggye de la misma zona salieron merjores; en la de Escuela Secundaria Basica, los de ambos sexos de la Escuela Secundaria Basica de Yon-am del distrito de Paek-am y en la rama de Escuela Primaria, los de la Escuela Primaria de Tonghung del capitalino municipio de Jung y las de la Escuela Primaria de Hungdok del municipio de Hungdok de la ciudad de Hamhung de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, respectivamente.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 23 la ceremonia de otorgamiento de premios.
